entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 3:32 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 80 gusting to 120 in the evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
